name: Community Action Agency of Delaware County
organization: Community Action Agency of Delaware County
description:
The Mission of the Community Action Agency of Delaware County, Inc. and its affiliate corporations and partnerships is to assist residents to move toward economic self-sufficiency and to strengthen the community through innovative approaches to programs including: housing, workforce development, energy conservation, social services and community and economic development.

Community Action Agency of Delaware County, Inc. strives to prudently but creatively utilize all available resources and to develop community collaborations to reach their goals.

http://www.caadc.org
